step.set_update_mode: Step 1: Put your {tracker} tracker into update mode.
step.flash: Step 3: Flash the selected firmware to your {tracker} tracker.

step_note.set_update_mode: This will turn your tracker into DFU mode, letting the trackers appear as something similar to "HaritoraXW-UPDATE".
step_note.select_update_mode: Select the tracker that is now in update mode. It should appear as something similar to "HaritoraXW-UPDATE".
step_note.flash: This will flash the selected firmware to your tracker.
